12-03-2009, 12:39 PM #1 jandmama View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2009 Posts 29 Free Juicy Juice Sippy Cup Register and receive a free Juicy Juice Sippy Cup:
http://www.juicyjuice.com/Special-Offers/Default.aspx Reply With Quote 12-03-2009, 06:15 PM #2 jodeci77 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2008 Location Springfield, IL Posts 128
I got this for my niece&my mom swears it's the best sippie cup ever. 0 leaks! Reply With Quote 12-04-2009, 08:28 AM #3 astrosfan View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Aug 2007 Location Mississippi Posts 173 I got one for my son and LOVE IT!!! I'm sending one to my niece now. Reply With Quote 12-05-2009, 01:23 PM #4 mousiez View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2007 Posts 102 get one, everyone Last year the first strains of H1N1 hit our house, ALL of us were so sick we literally could not move. And we live on a farm...and we still had to go and tend the animals. not fun. The ONE saving grace was having this sippy cup, because it could fall on the bed, and not spill....and it didn't give too much liquid at one time. While it's available, everyone, get one for each of your family, you won't regret it! Reply With Quote
